questions.question: Which of the following is the primary advantage of using the Hyperband algorithm for hyperparameter tuning over other methods?
options: It allocates more resources to promising configurations while stopping underperforming configurations early
It randomly selects hyperparameters to reduce training time
It guarantees that all hyperparameter combinations are tested
It uses prior training results to suggest the next set of hyperparameters to test
correct_answers: It allocates more resources to promising configurations while stopping underperforming configurations early
questions.Practice test: AWS Machine Learning Engineer - Associate Practice Test 3
